original_text: All these people met together in Jerusalem in the 15th year after Asa had become king. They met in the third month of the year.
korean_text: 아사 왕 제십오년 셋째 달에 그들이 예루살렘에 모이고

sentences.original_text: All these people met together in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들이 예루살렘에 함께 모였습니다

sentences.original_text: in the 15th year after Asa had become king
sentences.korean_translation: 아사가 왕이 된 지 15년째 되던 해에

sentences.original_text: They met in the third month of the year
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 해의 세 번째 달에 만났습니다
